sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mktevt_marketing_event</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate total cost</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function onAfter(current, previous) {
  //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
    var budget = current.budget;
    var mrkevent = current.sys_id;
    var evtname = current.name;
    //Get the total cost of equipment for this event
    var equipment = new totalCost(mrkevent);
    var cost = equipment.getCost();
    gs.addInfoMessage('The total cost of ' + evtname + ' is ' + cost + '.');
    //Compare cost to budget
    if(cost > budget){
        gs.addErrorMessage('Equipment costs for ' + evtname + ' exceed the event budget.');
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-02-09 14:42:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a933df10136dda00d70530f82244b09c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate total cost</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mktevt">db5fe3ce13555a00d70530f82244b06f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">db5fe3ce13555a00d70530f82244b06f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a933df10136dda00d70530f82244b09c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-02-09 16:22:43</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a933df10136dda00d70530f82244b09c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_ed119710136dda00d70530f82244b03b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mktevt_marketing_event</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate marketing event</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var evtbudget = current.budget.getCurrencyValue();
	if(evtbudget < 1){
		gs.addErrorMessage('Budget must be greater than zero');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	//Replace the table name with your instance's table name 
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_mktevt_marketing_event');
	gr.get(current.marketing_event);
	gr.number_of_attendees_registered += 1;
	gr.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-02-04 20:39:25</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>b5a7477e13919a00d70530f82244b09d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update attendee count</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mktevt">db5fe3ce13555a00d70530f82244b06f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">db5fe3ce13555a00d70530f82244b06f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b5a7477e13919a00d70530f82244b09d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-02-04 20:39:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b5a7477e13919a00d70530f82244b09d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0aaa67d4136dda00d70530f82244b009
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_mktevt.totalCost</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Generate the total cost of a marketing event based on the equipment requests associated wit it.  Compare the total cost to the event budget.</description><name>totalCost</name><script><![CDATA[var totalCost = Class.create();
totalCost.prototype = {
    initialize: function(mrkevent) {
		this.mrkevent = mrkevent;
    },
	
	getCost: function() {
		var cost = 0;
	    //Get the total cost of all equipment for this event
		var equipment = new GlideRecord('x_snc_mktevt_equiptment_request');
		equipment.addQuery('maketing_event', this.mrkevent);
		equipment.query();
		while(equipment.next()){
			cost = cost + parseFloat(equipment.cost.getCurrencyValue());
		}
		return cost;
	},
    type: 'totalCost'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-02-09 15:10:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0aaa67d4136dda00d70530f82244b009</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>totalCost</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mktevt">db5fe3ce13555a00d70530f82244b06f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">db5fe3ce13555a00d70530f82244b06f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0aaa67d4136dda00d70530f82244b009</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-02-09 15:21:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
